job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.industry: Renewables & Environment,Information Technology and Services,Computer Software

solving the toughest problems facing the energy industry and creating innovative forecasting and optimization solutions that lead the way into the next era of energyltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtposition specific descriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtwe are seeking an experienced software engineer to join our new product engineering team the position will interact with all business units in nextera analytics and will work in all phases of the software development life cycle including requirements gathering and refinement system design implementation and testing qualified candidates will spend the majority of their time developing software that helps nextera analytics provide innovative forecasting and optimization solutions for the energy industry the candidate will act as a technical lead of a software component or moduleltbrgtltbrgta desire to work with some of the latest big data technologies is preferred but not required you should apply if you think of yourself as someone who is not afraid to explore new technologies in the event the product or feature calls for it a personality that embraces change and is a continuous learner in our team engineers have the freedom to create the best solutions possible with the latest technologies available be ready to work in a fastpaced environment solving some of the most challenging problems within the energy industry alongside a team of data scientists and a dedicated science teamltbrgtltbrgtlastly you will not be expected to be on call but on the rare occasion in which there is a need for production support on a product you have worked on and for which the production team is unable to resolve the issues you may be reached out toltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtjob overviewltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtthis position writes and tests software to aid in development and support of products individuals in this role work with technical leads on software system architecture and service design and typically leads a module in the system
